briefTitle: A Study of Degarelix in Taiwanese Patients With Prostate Cancer
officialTitle: An Open-label, Multi-centre Registration Trial, Investigating Efficacy and Safety of Degarelix One-month Dosing Regimen in Taiwanese Patients With Prostate Cancer Requiring Androgen Ablation Therapy
summary: A phase III trial investigating the efficacy and safety of degarelix one-month depot in Taiwanese patients with prostate cancer.

primaryOutcome.measure: Cumulative Probability of Participants With Testosterone at Castrate Level <= 0.5 ng/mL From Day 28 to Day 168
